mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY product_no asc

SELECT * FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW, (SELECT AVG(NVL(review_score, 0)) as review_avg from PRODUCT_REVIEW) WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{product_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_REVIEW (MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_NO, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_SCORE, REVIEW_IMG, REVIEW_DATE) VALUES( #{member_id}, #{product_no}, #{review_content}, #{review_score}, #{review_img}, #{review_date} )
